sentences.sContent: Only his physical gifts and unflappable determination could nullify the Magic's season sweep.
sentences.sContent_eng: Only his physical gifts and unflappable determination could nullify the Magic's season sweep.
sentences.sCn: 只有他那非凡的身体天赋和镇定的夺冠决心可以让魔术队本赛季对湖人的横扫失去意义。

trans.tranOther: having the ability to stay calm and not become upset, even in difficult situations
